entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 p.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low plus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
